overview:
Cameron is the VP of Engineering at Mindflash.com, a company on a mission to build the best online training software for businesses. Mindflash is backed by IGSB, the investors behind The Learning Company, Advent Software, AppFolio and Global English. The company is headquartered in Palo Alto, California.

Cameron was most recently the Director of Software Development for RealtyTrac, and was also the co-founder of Strangeloop Networks.

At Mindflash.com Cameron is a member of the executive staff and is responsible for leading the engineering team. As one of the first employees at RealtyTrac ,Cameron built up the development team and helped grow RealtyTrac from a small startup to the top online foreclosure marketplace.

Cameron holds a BA in Physics from Wheaton College (MA). He can be seen speaking on Agile Development and User Experience Design.

video_embeds.embed_code: MX 2011 | Cameron Gray | Great Designs Deserve to Be Built: Agile Development and UX from Adaptive Path on Vimeo.
UX Week 2010 | Paula Wellings & Cameron Gray | Turning a Developer-driven Organization into a UX Company from Adaptive Path on Vimeo.
